name: App Rush
description:
DescriptionApp Rush, the best game about Apps, Virus and Anti-virus

An exciting survival game that is based on how people download applications on while surfing the internet facing risks of downloading a virus

App Rush is free to play but might offer in-app purchases such as Anti-virus which will require payment in future releases.

App Rush features:
● Click Apps on screen to gain scores
● Unleash unique Anti-virus power ups to help you clear viruses off the screen
● Advance through levels to meet new characters
● Complete tasks in levels and unlock more levels
● New level added every 4 weeks
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and compete with them

● Post Scores to your favorite social networks
